input_text:
Job Title: Financial Advisor

Location: Ormond Beach, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Are you a natural connector in your community? Do you like building relationships or have an entrepreneurial drive? With uncapped income, the flexibility of running a business and a proven success path, this career is life changing. We would love the opportunity to connect!We’ve been helping clients achieve financial security for over 165 years and are searching for certain individuals to help us carry on that tradition. No financial experience required. We will train, coach, mentor and develop the right candidate in our Wealth Management Advisor Program. Here, you’ll have access to award-winning training, technology, planning tools and supportive mentors to help you deliver expert advice to your clients.Prior financial services experience not needed -- extensive training platform provided.We want people with different backgrounds and work experience, including but not limited to:Financial management, sales, insurance, and financial servicesExecutive leadershipCommunity influencersFormer athletesEducatorsMilitary backgroundPrior sales and/ or business experience preferredBA or BS degree from a four-year institution or 4 years military preferred - considerations will be made for backgrounds without. Candidate must be an accomplished communicator with strong verbal and written skills. Prior sales and/or business experience preferred. Candidate must also possess a history of personal and professional success.** Must be located in the area or planning to move here imminently**Our Work:We believe our financial planning experience, specifically the implementation phase and development of a long-term relationship with clients, represents some of the most important work anyone can endeavor to do, a truly noble profession. People need us! There is an epidemic of financial ignorance, procrastination, and poor judgement in America. We are on a collective mission to solve this problem one new client at a time. Lastly, the people who are most attracted to work with us tend to be ‘others focused’, motivated by service, and possess a strong, innate desire to be part of something bigger than themselves. We are fond of saying, “Family is everything." We are, and always will be, growth oriented.Our People:At its very core, our firm is based on encouraging each other to be authentic, genuine and caring. We never take ourselves too seriously, and we love to laugh and have fun! We challenge and inspire everyone to become the absolute best version of themselves. That journey entails developing a deep understanding of who you are and who you desire to become.Preferred qualifications:4-Year College Degree or 4 Years Active-Duty MilitarySelf-Starter; Highly MotivatedA History of SuccessEntrepreneurialStrong Interpersonal & Networking SkillsAccolades, Ratings and Assessments:Northwestern Mutual is annually honored as on the of the “Worlds’ Most Admired Companies” in the life insurance industry according to FORTUNE magazine’s annual survey.Highest financial ratings. Unsurpassed in financial strength.Northwestern Mutual is annually ranked as one of the “50 Best Companies to Sell For” by Selling Power magazine; fifteen consecutive years, and recognized as the best company to sell for in the financial services industry.Business Week recently recognized Northwestern Mutual as one of the “Best Places to Launch a Career”.Northwestern Mutual named “Best Places to Work” by Glassdoor.com; ranked #1 in our industry.Ranking organizations that excel at training and leadership development, Training Magazine ranked Northwestern Mutual among its “Training Top 125”.Ranked among the Top 10 independent Broker-Dealers as measured by total revenues by leading investment industry publications: Investment News; Financial Advisor magazine, Financial Planning magazine; Investment Advisor magazine.JD Power ranked us #1 in Customer Satisfaction among All Individual Life Insurance Providers in 2019

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Financial Advisor
output_json.summary: Natural connector in community, building relationships, entrepreneurial drive.
preferred_degrees: BA or BS degree from a four-year institution
soft_skills: history of personal and professional success
output_json.company_information: Helping clients achieve financial security for over 165 years, focusing on financial planning, growth orientation, and collective mission to solve financial problems.

other.content: Self-starter, highly motivated, history of success, entrepreneurial, strong interpersonal & networking skills

World's Most Admired Companies, highest financial ratings, best companies to sell for, best places to launch a career, best places to work, top 10 independent Broker-Dealers, JD Power Customer Satisfaction
